div.p: Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die marcij anno quo supra

head.add: The commissaris to by Sanct nicholes led'

div.p:
The saide day the ballieis Consal and communite warnit be the hande bell throw
the tone gathtreit Circualie Inquerit grantit and ordanit ane commissione
to be writin vndir thar commone sele to gilbert menyeis and Alexander gray to by fiftene
fudir' of leide for Salmonde as thai cane aggre witht Inglismen to our'
kirk and thekin of it Ande to pay the saide Salmonde within xv dais
eftir the saide lede be deliuerit fre one the key of Abirdene

The said day the borrowis fundin betuix Johne collisone ande Williame buchane
ande the actione' movit be the aldirman agane the said Johnne at the request of the
gude mane Robert blinseile was continewit to the law day eftir pasche in hope
of concorde et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xvij die marcij Anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander crag grantit and promittit to Sele the chartir
maid' be him to Androw Stewinsone of his forbutht with his
avne Sele to morne or ewin and the saide Androw sale sele
his Reuersion' of iijxx li' scottis money the saide Alexander bringand'
the saide Reuersion' to the saide Androwe

xvj die marcij anno quo supra Andreas lousone fecit constituit creauit et
Nominauit magistrum badenaghe et blinsell sponsa sua coniunctim et diuisim
suos legittimos procuratores actores factores et factores prosequendum suum processusm coram
preposito et ballivis dicti burgi Inceptum de et super recuperacione terre Interioris Johannis
malisone Jacentis in vico castri et cetera ex boreali parte eiusdem vici pro Releuacione terre sue
anterioris dicti tenementi de annuo Redditu viginti solidorum prout in actis Curie prece
dentis plenius continuetur Ac in omnibus aliis actionibus causis et materiis ipsum concernendum
Agendum defendendum prosequendum Respondendum promittens de Rato et grato ac cum omnibus aliis
clausulis necesseriis et oportunis in vberiore forma procuratorij

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis marcij Anno
quo supra et cetera

The said day patry leslie schew and oppinly declarit that he hede set to Johnne Wormet
ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik the quhilk he offerit to defend to the said Johnne
as law will protestand solemptlie in presence of the said Johnne that gif he sustenis ony
skaitht tharuntile it turne nocht to nay preiudice to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo Sexto die mensis
marcij Anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo quarto

Eodem die Accedens ad barram thomas Ridale peciit Willelmum Colp procuratorio nomine Dauid Colp
vocarj ad respondendum plegio super ipsum porrecto penes releuacioni et sui de vno
annuo Redditu decim solidorum prout in actis Curie precedens plenius' Continetur Igitur precipitur Willelmo
scrimgeour seriendo ad capiendum districtio a dicto Willelmo et eundem sibi ad plegium dimittere se petetur et
eundem Willelmum premunire ad comparendum in proxima Curia capitali dicti burgi tenendum
xv die mensis aprilis proximis futuris ad respondendum dicto plegio tanquam tercio die huius processus

The saide day ormvnde leslie grantit he hade resauit ane peuter plat fra Johne
andirson' the tyme the kinge was in this burghe quhilkis was avay and coud nocht be gottin
Ande the aldirman and balyeis chargit the saide ormvnde to get ane plat to the said' Johne
and he grantit to gett ane plat and bring it befor thame to Restoir' the said Johne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxixo die
mensis marcij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo quarto

The saide day Johne annand' was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Richerde
Waus yongar forspekar for trubulance of Duncan portar quhilk trubulance was
licht for the quhilkis the saide Johne was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and the
said' Duncan was quyt of the wranguis' labouring of his yerde Ande the
assis' ordanit the saide Johne tile ask the saide Duncan forgiwnes and Suffir'
him to labour' his yerde for the Amendis of the said' trubulance

Eodem die Duncanus Colisone inuenit patricium adamsone plegium legalem per manum
terras et bona quod Alexander hay erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et
Andreas stratone deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Duncanus erit Indempnis pro dicto Alexandro
aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi
submissione

Eodem die Johannes arthour deuenit plegius legalis quod Elizabetht steuart erit
Indempnis pro Johanne annand' aliter quam per viam Juris Et Duncanus portar deuenit plegius legalis
quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro dictus elizabeth aliter quam per viam Juris et quilibet parcium
obligatur ad conseruandum plegius indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Penultimo die marcij anno immediate quo supra Thomas fyf fecit constituit creauit et
Nominauit Duncanum fyf summ legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem actorem et factorem se et suam
piscariam dimidi Rethis de Raik defendendum Agendum prosequendum et omnia alia
et Singulam faciendum et exercendum In premisse promittens de Rato et grato
in vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyeis
forspekar that Dauid theman sal gif in the names that he allegiis
bad hyme mak the seill in writ and ger thaim be warnit be ane
officiar and cum to schir Johannes stirueling clerk and depone be thar
aithez quhat thai knaw Anent the making of the said seill quhilk
deposicionis salbe oppinnit apone the law day to the assis'
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die mensis Aprilis Anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes Saifray alias lindesay conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Dauid
blinsele prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Andree low Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Et Idem
Andres conuictus fuit pro perturbio dicti Johannis et cetera Ac ordinatum fuit per dictam assisam quod prefatus
Johannes veniet petet a dicto Andrea et si ipsum aut quemcumque alium perturbauit in postram
et inde conuictus fuerit Soluet sancti Sanguinis lumini fabrice ecclesie xl s'

div.head: Hed Court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Decimo quinto de
mensis Aprilis Anno Dominj millesimo quingentesimo Quarto Eodem die sectis vocatis et
curia affirmata absens patent et cetera

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Aberdene decimo quinto mensis aprilis Anno Domini millesimo
quingentesimo quarto Coram honorabilibus viris Alexandro menyeis preposito thoma lesly
Johanne mar junior Johanne Collisone tribus balliuorum dictj burgj in pretorio eiusdem in curia
capitali pro tribunali sedens per subscripti videlicet Robertum blynseile Dauid menyeis Johannem
Cullane alexandrum chamer Andream cullane Johannem Wormet Johannem Knollis Robertum
Collisone patricium lesly patricium Red Johannem blak malcomum crag Willelmum Kyntor
Johannem Annand' Johannem auchneive bugensem dicti burgj Qui Jurati dicunt
quod quondam Agnes gray Auia Jonete Trumpat latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestita
et Sasita ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostrj Regis de quadam terra Jacente
infra dictum burgum in le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram
quondam mathej Wricht ex australi ex vna et terram Willelmi ffuthes ex borealj
partibus ab altera et communiem viam regiam versus oriens et communionem venellam
versus occidens Et quod dicta Joneta est legittima et propinquior heres dicte quondam
Agnestis Auie sui de dicta cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta
terra valet nunc per annum quibus solidos Et valuit duos solidos tempore pacis
Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis per spacium trium Annuorum aut eocirca
ob decessim dicte Agnetis in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiuscumque minime prose
quentis

Idem Jurati dicunt quod quondam dominus Johannes Strathachin capellanus patrius
Jonete strathachyne latricis obiij vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad
pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum
in le futy inter terram

Et quod dicta Joneta est legittima et propinquior heres dictj quondam domini Johanne
patriuj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime estatis Et quod dicta
terra valet nunc per annis quinque solidos Et valuit duos solidos tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis ob decessum dictj
quondam domini Johannis per spacium duorum et duorum mensium aut eocirca
in defectu virj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis Datis et clausulis

The said day Johanne collisone oblist hyme tile stande abid at the ordinance
of Robert blinseile Johnne lesly of Warderis Dauid menyeis Alexander Chamer
Johnne of Knollis James collisone and Duncan collisone Anent the actioune' betuix
Alexander mensyeis and hyme and movit aganis hyme be the said aldirman
To the quhilkis the aldirman grantit and consentyt sa that thai determyt tharintile betuix
this and friday nixt hereftir or x houris befor noyne And' failyheing tharof that he
wald' follow the said mater befor the ballies

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Johannes litstar procurator capel
lanorum sine vicariorum collegij ecclesie cathederalis Abirdonensis Et protestabatur in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu dictis capellanis a longo tempore debito
et non soluto de quadam terra vasta mathei branche Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico Nauium ex austra orientali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam Jacobi Kintor
ex orientali ex vna et communiones vias regias ex occidentali et boreali partibus et terram
quondam Andree lammyntone versus austrum Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne Kyntor Duncano Ross'
et Ormundo lesly sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Andreas Storour prior domus fratrum car
melitarum de Aberdene' nomine dictus domus et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
Redditu xiij solidorum et quatuor denariorum de quadam terra vasta Jacente in le grene
quondam Dauid strachin inter terram quondam Johannis Duruard' ex orientali ex vna Et
communiones vias regias boream occidens et austrum sibi et dictus domus annuatim a longo
tempore debito et non soluet Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die
huius processus Testibus Dauid tailyeour georgio tailyeour thoma gledstand Et ormundo
lesly sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Andreas stourour prior domus fratrem
carmelitarum de Abirdene et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu decim
s' sibi et dictus domus annuatim a longo tempore debito et non soluet de terra vasta
Johanne pyot Jacente in vico viridj ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram Jacobj pyot
ex occidentali ex vna et terram dictum fratrem sine omus ex australi et communiones vias
regias versus oriens et boream Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 2o die huius processus testibus ut supra

The saide day Johnne of gordone follovit Johnne of cullan be ane borgh'
for the wrangwis' withhaldin fra hyme of vxx stanys of wol and vij to compt and
Reknyng price stane vij s' Ande the said Johnne of cullan ansuerit to the said'
borgh' one this wis' he referit to the said Johnne of gordonis atht how mekle
he had ressauit for the pament of the said woll And the said Johnne of gordone
deponit he had ressauit x franche crovnys of gold' and fyfty s' in penny
worthis And the said Johnne of cullan suld' mak pament to hyme of vxx
stanys of woll and thre And sa restis the said Johnne cullan awand to the
said Johnne gordone xxvj li' and xj s' quhilkis the ballies chargit hyme
to pay within terme of law

Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis per thomam lamyntone' de et super recuperacione proprietatis
et possessionis de quadam terra vasta iacente in le futy inter terram quondam Johannis Waus
ex boreali australi et terram Robertj blinseile ex boreali in defectu solucionis vnius annuj
redditus triginta duorum denariorum vsualis monete Scocie sibi annuatim debito et a
longo tempore non soluet Vnde dictus thomas pecijt a nobis secundum tenorem vnij formam
et effectum eiusdem processus Juris et Justicie complementum sibi fierj de eadem terra cum
pertinenciis Et consequenter dominus Dauid liell prelocutor dicti thome plegium in manibus
gilbertj prestone vnius sergeandorum dictj burgj quod ipse thomas proprietatem et possessionem recu
perauit de dicta terra cum pertinenciis in defectu solucionis dicti Annuj redditus Vnde
hora dicj legittime expectata omnibus Interesse habenti vocato et nullo comparenti de
Jure opponenti Decretum fuit ex ore Alexandri Joffrasone Judicatoris curie et data
pro Judicio et cetera Testibus patricio lesly patricio reid Johanne Annand' Andrea
stevinsone magistro Johanne badenagh' dominus Dauid leill et thoma lamyntone
capellanus

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus
ac procurator altaris
Eodem die tribus processibus perlectis per discretum virum dominum Willelmum cruk
schank capellanum ac procuratorem altaris sanctj Duthacj infra ecclesiam perrochialem
sanctj nicholaj de Abirdene situati de et super recuperacione proprietatis et posses
sionis cuiusdam terre vaste quondam thome Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam thome prat
ex orientali ex vna et communiones vias regias versus boream et occidens
in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus quinque solidorum sibi et dicto altarj
annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluet Vnde dictus dominus Willelmus pecijt
a nobis secundum vnij formam et effectum suj processus precedens Juris et iusticie
complementum sibi fierj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et consequentur magister
Johannes baidienagh' prelocutor dictj dominum Willelmi porrexit plegium in
manibus gilbertj prestone vnius sergeandorum dictj burgj quod ipse dominus
Willelmum proprietatem et possessionem recuperauit de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus Vnde hora diei legittime expectata
omnibus Interesse est habenti vocato et nullo comparenti de Jure opponenti Decretum
fuit ex ore Alexandrj Joffrasone Judicatoris curie et data pro iudicio
Testibus ut supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod patricius Dun
cansone est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Johannis Duncansone
patris sui burgensis Ruralis dictj burgj

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas Riddaile pecijt Willelmum colp procuratorio
nomine Dauid colp vocarj ad respondendum plegio super ipsum alias porrecto penes
Reluacioni et exoneracionem suj de vno annuo redditu decim solidorum prout in actis
curie precedentis plenius continetur vocatus non comparuit Igitur precipitur
ord Ormundo lesly ad capiendum districtum a dicto Willelmo et eundem sibi
ad plegium dimittere si petatur et eundem Willelmum ad premunire ad comparendum
in curia balliuorum dictj burgj die lune pennultimo die aprilis ad respondendum
dicto plegio peremptorie tanquam quarto huius processus

The saide day patry chernside oblist him be his hande landis and gudis to content and
pay to Dauid Colisone threttj Schillingis Scottis money at Witsonday next to cum
In the Reconpens' of certan gret expensis and costis maid' be him for Androw vmfrais
brevis Ande Dauy strabogy oblist him to freithe the saide patry of the said' money

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus andreas collisone capellanus altaris
sanctj stephani infra ecclesiam parrochialiem sancti nicholaij de Aberdene
Situati et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et octo d'
vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a longo tempore non
soluet de quadam terra vasta quondam henricj Rany iacente in futy inter terram heredum
quondam henricj Willelmi Rany ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Willelmum Westland
ex borealj partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distingibile
preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in Sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus thoma lammyntone Willelmo King
et gilberto prestone sergeando

The saide day Dauy theman oppinly declarit and schew In his
conscience saule and aithe In presence of the haile court that Johne
low smytht Induellar' and burges of the said' burghe' was neuire
art nor part of the making of ane Seile quhilkis was maid'
Calland' it the Sele of the Craftismen of Abirdene

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die mensis Aprilis
anno quo supra

The saide day It was was statut ordanit and deliuerit be the Counsale that ther'
sale nay aile be sauld' derrar' thane viij d' the galloun' within this burghe'
quhile michaelmes day next hereftir Ande gif ony persone or personis beis
fundin Selling ony ale derrar' In continent the ballieis sale pas' and strik
and ding furtht thar caldroun or leid' bodum and seclude and expell thame
fra brevin and Selling of aile for ane yer' Ande gif ony gudman ples' to ger'
brewe to him barrell les' or mair' of ony quantite or of ony price it salbe lesum
to brewe the samyn and thai to ger' beir' it avay in the wescheall haill and nocht
to feche nor' tap it In quart nor pont

The saide day William Kintor grantit him aving to Androw lousone xv s' and viij d'
for ane cow quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said' day Alexander brabnir was in Ane amerciament of the Court be his avne tong gravnt
for strubulance of William scrimgeor officiar In the execucioun of his Office and to amend'
as law will et cetera

The said day george bissat lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit to Ansuer'
at the Instance of Sandy brabnir Anent the making of ane Sufficient hous' to him
et cetera protestande for Remed' of lawe

The saide day It was appontit and aggreit betuix Androw Cullane and thome laisk that
the ayris ande thar tutoris of vmquhile Robert of Cullane sale bruk the croftis set
to the saide Robert be vmquhile Adam of Cullane and his spous' for this Croipe to
the fest of michaelmes' day next hereftir for the maile contenit in the assedacioun'
And this croipe being of the grovnde the saide assedacioun salbe expirit et cetera

The said' day Alexander brabnir be his avne toung grant' was in ane Amerciament of the court
for strubulance of the court et cetera and to Amende as law will et cetera and forber' in tyme to Cum
et cetera

Vicesimo sexto die mensis Aprilis Anno quo supra Johannes gordone de lungar fecit
constituit creauit et nominauit Alexandrum Wyntoun' de Andart Willelmum baidenagh' et Ro
bertum in bothmagoge coniunctim et diuisim suos veros legittimos procuratores actores
factores ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Johanne Cullan summam vigintj
sex librarum et vndecim s' sibi debito prout in actis curie continetur et de
receptis acquitandis promittentis de rato et grato

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die aprilis
anno quo supra

The said' day the aldirman and ballieis assignit friday the x day of maij
next to Cum to patry Rede tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be
Androw murray for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ane barrele of Salmond'
and discernit the Copy of the saide borghe to the said' patry

vicesimo Septimo die mensis aprilis Anno quo supra Johannes gordone
de lunger' fecit Constituit creauit et nominauit patricium gordone de methlik
et Johannem Wyntone coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores Actores factores
et cetera dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri suam potestatem omnimodam et
mandatum speciale pro se et Nomine suo ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum
a Johanne Cullan summam xxvj li' et xj s' sibj debito et de receptis acquitandis
Et si necesse fuerit prepositj et balliuos dicti burgi pro solucione requirenti et cetera promittens
de Rato et grato Cum ceteris clausulis necesseriis et oportunis
